clinical_study.brief_title: Quality of Life and Life Satisfaction in Pediatric and Adolescent Gymnasts Through Injury
clinical_study.official_title: Quality of Life and Life Satisfaction in Pediatric and Adolescent Gymnasts Through Injury

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to assess the quality and life and life satisfaction of pediatric and adolescent gymnasts throughout their musculoskeletal injury recovery.

primary_outcome.description: A validated questionnaire that quantifies quality of life and life satisfaction in pediatric and adolescent populations.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At follow up visit, up to 3 months post initial visit
primary_outcome.description: A validated questionnaire that quantifies quality of life and life satisfaction in pediatric and adolescent populations.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (At clearance visit to return to sport)
primary_outcome.description: A validated questionnaire that quantifies quality of life and life satisfaction in pediatric and adolescent populations.
A validated questionnaire that quantifies quality of life and life satisfaction in pediatric and adolescent populations.
A validated questionnaire that quantifies quality of life and life satisfaction in pediatric and adolescent populations.
Questionnaire designed to assess patient fear of movement.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At follow up visit, up to 3 months post initial visit
primary_outcome.description: Questionnaire designed to assess patient fear of movement.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (At clearance visit to return to sport)
primary_outcome.description: Questionnaire designed to assess patient fear of movement.
Questionnaire designed to assess patient fear of movement.
Questionnaire designed to assess patient fear of movement.

secondary_outcome.description: Patient-reported details of their musculoskeletal injury, including injury location and type. Also asks for details regarding the participant's pain rating, duration of pain, and the impact the injury has on sport participation.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (At clearance visit to return to sport)
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire designed to identify an athlete's level of sport specialization.
Questionnaire designed to identify an athlete's level of sport specialization.
Questionnaire designed to identify an athlete's level of sport specialization.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at the patient's 1 day initial visit.
secondary_outcome.description: Patient-reported history of previous musculoskeletal injuries.
Questionnaire used to determine the participant's quality of sleep.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At follow up visit, up to 3 months post initial visit
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire used to determine the participant's quality of sleep.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (At clearance visit to return to sport)
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire used to determine the participant's quality of sleep.
Questionnaire used to determine the participant's quality of sleep.
Questionnaire used to determine the participant's quality of sleep.

study_pop.textblock: Participants will be recruited from Children's Hospital Colorado Sports medicine and Orthopedic outpatient clinics.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male and female gymnasts ages 8-18 years old
- Participating in Excel or Developmental gymnastics programs who present to Children's Hospital Colorado sports medicine or orthopedic clinics with a musculoskeletal injury.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Gymnasts only participating in Colorado Association for Recreational Athletics (CARA) gymnastics, retired gymnasts, and adult or collegiate gymnasts.
- Vulnerable populations (prisoners, pregnant women, individuals with decreased decision making capacity(
